\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 84130}

\subsection*{Pleasurable, Clean Stimulation}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{naginnudej}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 150 mg & oral & 4-Fluoroamphetamine & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 135.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I'm an experienced researcher who has a particular persuasion for stimulants. My stimulant experience is as follows: amphetamine, dextroamphetamine, methylphenidate, dexmethylpheniate, methylenedioxypryrovalerone (MDPV), MDMA, bk-MDMA, bk-MBDB,among others.



Set/Setting: 4-FA is acquired from trusted source in hopes of finding a new study aid. 150mg measured out on +/-.001mg scale. Allergy test produced no undesirable results.



..and without further adieu:

+00:00 150mg dissolved in distilled water and ingested on empty stomach. 



+00:35 Delightful nervousness and warmth building in chest. I'm light on my feet. 



+0:45 Getting chatty at this point.



+1:00-4:00 I'm impressed---undeniable entactogenic qualities with smooth stimulation keeps me on my toes. Work is accomplished with gusto and fervor; mixing music with a friend is particularly enjoyable.  



+4:15-7:45 Entactogenic qualities have subsided although there is lasting stimulation for the remainder of the experience. Physical discomfort was nearly non-existent. 



Conclusion: The subtle empathogenic qualities in conjunction with the clean stimulation really tie together this long-lasting stimulant. Recommended only if your in it for the long haul.

\end{document}
